library:
<class name="navigation/path_planning" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The PathPlanningNode generates a safe target path polynomial from raw target path points and collision prone obstacles

<class name="navigation/path_preprocessing" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The PathPreprocessingNode takes detected road lane points and generates the raw target path (target path points without collision avoidance).

<class name="navigation/collision_detection" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
detects obstacles that collide with lane points

<class name="navigation/localization" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Self-localization via integration of state_estimation data

<class name="navigation/blinker" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Takes care of activating the blinker before switching lanes
